title: karuDik-kaDaittEru
sahitya:
karudik-kaDaittEru manamE karuNAnidhi muruganai nI


anupallavi

  marudamalai mEl urai varadap-perumAnin tiruvaDit-tuNai tarum perumidap-pEru peravE


caraNam    piravi idanil uLLa peruvinai toDarAmal aravE maraindenrum ayarAmal irundiDa
varaiyillAk-koDaik-karam uDaiyOnin tiruvaruL tannai nI urudiyAi aDaiya
